SELECT B.ID ,B.REC_CZLS ,'项目编号:'||B.XMBM AS REC_HD ,B.REC_CZSM ,B.REC_CZSJ ,B.REC_IP ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME FROM D_020_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID WHERE 1=1
and B.DPRTCODE = #{paramsMap.DPRTCODE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ( UPPER(B.JDBH) like UPPER('%'||#{paramsMap.KEYWORD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%') )
order by B.REC_CZSJ DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , B.ID , '项目编号:'||B.XMBM AS REC_HD , B.DPRTCODE , B.WHBMID , B.WHRID , B.WHSJ , B.XMBM , B.XMMC , B.XMZL , B.FJZT , B.FJZCH , B.FJXLH , B.FXSJ , B.FXXH , B.IPCYXXH , (CASE WHEN B.ZT = 1 THEN '保存' WHEN B.ZT = 2 THEN '提交' WHEN B.ZT = 9 THEN '关闭' WHEN B.ZT = 10 THEN '完成' END) NEW_ZT , B.REC_XGLX , B.REC_CZRID , B.REC_CZSJ , B.REC_CZSM , B.REC_CZLS , B.REC_ZBID , B.REC_IP ,WHR.USERNAME||' '||WHR.REALNAME AS REC_CZR_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} THEN 'CURRENT' ELSE 'LAST' END) DATA_VERSION FROM D_020_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR ON WHR.ID = B.WHRID WHERE B.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( SELECT REC_CZSJ FROM D_020_REC WHERE REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType = VARCHAR} AND ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) >= B.REC_CZSJ ) WHERE 2 >= RNO

SELECT A.REC_CZLS,A.REC_XGLX,A.WHR_REC_REALNAME,A.REC_HD,A.REC_IP, A.WZ,A.JH,A.XLH,A.XH,A.WZ_NAME, A.DATA_VERSION, (CASE WHEN (a.wz=31 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') ||' APUH' WHEN (a.wz=21 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') ||' EH' WHEN (a.wz=22 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') ||' EH' WHEN (a.wz=23 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') ||' EH' WHEN (a.wz=24 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,1,'i') ||' EH' ELSE '' END) AS CC1, (case WHEN (a.wz=31 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') ||' APUC' WHEN (a.wz=21 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') ||' EC' WHEN (a.wz=22 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') ||' EC' WHEN (a.wz=23 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') ||' EC' WHEN (a.wz=24 and REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') is not null) then REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(A.SJZ),'[^,]+',1,2,'i') ||' EC' ELSE '' END) AS CC2, to_date(REGEXP_SUBSTR(wm_concat(to_char(A.REC_CZSJ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')), '[^,]+', 1, 1, 'i'), 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as REC_CZSJ
FROM( SELECT B.* ,'CURRENT' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,(CASE WHEN B.WZ = 11 THEN '机身' WHEN B.WZ = 21 THEN '1发' WHEN B.WZ = 22 THEN '2发' WHEN B.WZ = 23 THEN '3发' WHEN B.WZ = 24 THEN '4发' WHEN B.WZ = 31 THEN 'APU' END ) WZ_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' END ) REC_HD FROM D_02001_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.MAINID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION ALL
SELECT B.* ,'LAST' DATA_VERSION ,WHR_REC.USERNAME||' '||WHR_REC.REALNAME WHR_REC_REALNAME ,(CASE WHEN B.WZ = 11 THEN '机身' WHEN B.WZ = 21 THEN '1发' WHEN B.WZ = 22 THEN '2发' WHEN B.WZ = 23 THEN '3发' WHEN B.WZ = 24 THEN '4发' WHEN B.WZ = 31 THEN 'APU' END ) WZ_NAME ,(CASE WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 0 THEN '创建' WHEN B.REC_CZSM = 12 THEN '修改' END) REC_HD FROM D_02001_REC B LEFT JOIN T_USER WHR_REC ON WHR_REC.ID = B.REC_CZRID WHERE B.MAINID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND B.REC_CZLS IN ( SELECT REC_CZLS FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REC_CZSJ DESC) RNO , REC_CZLS FROM D_020_REC A WHERE A.ID = #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.REC_CZSJ <= ( SELECT C.REC_CZSJ FROM D_020_REC C WHERE C.ID= #{paramsMap.ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND C.REC_CZLS = #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND A.REC_CZLS != #{paramsMap.REC_CZLS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE 1 = RNO ) ) A
GROUP BY A.REC_CZLS,A.REC_XGLX,A.WHR_REC_REALNAME,A.REC_HD,A.REC_IP, A.WZ,A.JH,A.XLH,A.XH,A.WZ_NAME,A.DATA_VERSION
